sentence: Trump endorsed 2020 GOP gubernatorial nominee Loren Culp, who refused to concede that race despite losing by 13.5 points to Democratic Gov.
title: New lines, interesting races in Washington state

sentence: Trump's pick is 2020 gubernatorial nominee Loren Culp, a far-right ex-cop who took in just $46,000 and had $24,000 in the bank.
title: House Republicans all lead their challengers in recent fundraising
